meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful Arethusas.
meanings.sent2: I saw many Arethusas blooming in the field.
meanings.sent3: The Arethusas seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a field of Arethusas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The Arethusas added a splash of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: Arethusas: belonging to or characteristic of Arethusa
meanings.sent1: She wore an elegant dress with Arethusas patterns.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the Arethusas essence of the garden.
meanings.sent3: His Arethusas charm always brightened the room.
meanings.sent4: The Arethusas sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The Arethusas music filled the air with joy.
